title: The pride of China ! UU from CANBOT showed up at TianJin National Game Openning Ceremory and lightened the main torch
describe: Golden autumn, make TianJin colorful and splendent. As the biggest and highest level comprehensive game in China, the grand opening of the 13th National Game was held on Aug.27 2017 at the birthplace of China Olympic ---TianJin.
content:
Golden autumn, make TianJin colorful and splendent. As the biggest and highest level comprehensive game in China, the grand opening of the 13th National Game was held on Aug.27 2017 at the birthplace of China Olympic ---TianJin.  China modern sports returns to here to make a new chapter with 100years  accumulation of history . It is destined as athletic competitive show , a sports Carnival for all people as well.

As the important component of every game, opening ceremory becomes a great stage of local traditional culture and people’s creative intelligence of the holder.

From the boxing King Ali,who was fighting against disease, at Atlantic Olympic Game in 1996, to gymnastic King-LiNing flying in sky at BeiJing 2008 Olympic Game , the torch lightener is the focus of every game’s opening ceremony.  The highlights of TianJin National Game Opening Ceremory is first using a humanoid intelligent robot as the torch lightener in the world.

Under millions of eyes, UU from CANBOT,together with TianJin boy,travel on HaiHe river on flying boat and lightened the main game torch together !


This is a creation of artificial intelligence and athletic game, humanities and technology clash brilliant sparks together.

As China self developed and mass producted humanoid intelligent  commercial use service robot, UU displays the highest level of China’s robotic technology with the perfect performance and opens another  strong  practical application  area.

CANBOT UU, the great pride of China !
